tab3.title1: How to register in-game account to Discord?

tab4.text1:
The Shrine of protection is unlocked at level 20 and is made in the smithy.

You must be in a tribe in order to place it.
If everyone leaves the tribe, shrine will be destroyed.
Once placed, the shrine will automatically activate after 30 minutes when the last tribe member log off from the server.
Turrets will then do twice as much damage.
Raiders will be alerted when approaching in range of the protected base, an orange text will appear at the top of the screen.
When the delay has elapsed, the cracks will light up orange, all structures within the radius will be protected from any damage.
This only protects structures.
In order to protect dinos, cover them with structures.
The structure has 250,000 HP, you can display the protection range via the radial menu (7200).
Every players can see the dome when you show its range.
Shrine still protects even without this dome.
If a member reconnects, protection will be removed from all structures after 1 minute, the color will then turn blue.When you log off again, the timer resumes.
If no tribe member logs in within 48 hours, the shrine will be destroyed and structures will lose their protection.
48H online protection available in Shop⁠.
Why I can't placesee Shrine engram ?
● Uninstall Base Protection Suite mod.
● Restart game.
●Join server.
